V

validCoinInserted(CoinSlot, Coin) - Method in class ca.ucalgary.seng300.a2.CoinListener
Responds to "Valid coin inserted" notifications from the registered CoinSlot.
validCoinInserted(CoinSlot, Coin) - Method in interface org.lsmr.vending.hardware.CoinSlotListener
An event announcing that the indicated, valid coin has been inserted and successfully delivered to the storage device connected to the indicated coin slot.
VendingListener - Class in ca.ucalgary.seng300.a2
Acts as the superclass for the various listener classes.
VendingListener() - Constructor for class ca.ucalgary.seng300.a2.VendingListener
 
VendingMachine - Class in org.lsmr.vending.hardware
Represents a standard configuration of the vending machine hardware: one configuration panel; one coin return; one coin slot; one coin receptacle to store coins entered by the user; a set of one or more coin racks (the number and the denomination of coins stored by each is specified in the constructor); one delivery chute used to deliver pop cans and to return coins; a set of one or more pop can racks (the number, cost, and pop name stored in each is specified in the constructor); one textual display; a set of one or more selection buttons (exactly one per pop can rack); and two indicator lights: one to indicate that exact change should be used by the user; the other to indicate that the machine is out of order.
VendingMachine(int[], int, int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class org.lsmr.vending.hardware.VendingMachine
Creates a standard arrangement for the vending machine.
VendingManager - Class in ca.ucalgary.seng300.a2
VendingManager is the primary access-point for the logic controlling the VendingMachine hardware.
VendingManagerSystemTest - Class in ca.ucalgary.seng300.a2.test
 
VendingManagerSystemTest() - Constructor for class ca.ucalgary.seng300.a2.test.VendingManagerSystemTest
